content:
TITLE: Installing Vibe 3 Packages (Bash) DESCRIPTION: Commands for installing the new @vibe/core and @vibe/icons packages, and removing the old monday-ui-react-core package. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/storybook/stand-alone-documentaion/migration-guide.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` yarn add @vibe/core @vibe/icons # or npm install @vibe/core @vibe/icons yarn remove monday-ui-react-core # or npm uninstall monday-ui-react-core ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Migrating Tipseen Component Props DESCRIPTION: Updated prop names and default values for the Tipseen component. The content prop is now required, color defaults to 'inverted', and several props have been renamed or removed. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/docs/vibe-3-changelog.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` isCloseButtonHidden={true} // OLD hideCloseButton={true} // NEW color="primary" // To maintain previous default color ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Vibe components in React.js DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to import individual components from the @vibe/core package. Components are imported directly from the library's root entry. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Button } from "@vibe/core"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Components and Libraries for Vibe Project Documentation DESCRIPTION: This code snippet imports various components and libraries needed to create a 'Getting Started' page in Storybook. It includes imports for Markdown rendering, syntax highlighting, and custom components for enhanced documentation. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/storybook/stand-alone-documentaion/getting-started.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` import { Meta, Markdown, Source } from "@storybook/blocks"; import { Link } from "vibe-storybook-components"; import { EDITABLE_HEADING, HEADING, TEXT } from "../components/related-components/component-description-map"; import { Prism as SyntaxHighlighter } from "react-syntax-highlighter"; import { dark } from "react-syntax-highlighter/dist/esm/styles/prism"; import { DiffCodeBlock } from "../components/DiffCodeBlock"; import readme from "../../../../../README.md"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Combobox with Search Functionality in JSX DESCRIPTION: Shows how to create a Combobox with search functionality for filtering names. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/Combobox/__stories__/Combobox.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Dropdown with PopupsContainerSelector in Modal DESCRIPTION: Example of implementing a dropdown within a modal using the popupsContainerSelector prop. Shows the complete setup including container configuration and modal integration with a multi-select dropdown. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/storybook/patterns/dropdown-in-modals/dropdown-in-modals.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating Button Size Props DESCRIPTION: Shows the change in Button component size prop values from abbreviated to full words SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/storybook/stand-alone-documentaion/migration-guide.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` - ``` LANGUAGE: diff CODE: ``` + .click-me-button { + margin-left: var(--spacing-small); + } + ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating Steps Component Color Props DESCRIPTION: Shows the change from isOnPrimary boolean prop to color prop in Steps component SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/storybook/stand-alone-documentaion/migration-guide.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` - + ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering SplitButton with Icons and Custom Options in JSX DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to create a SplitButton with icons and custom options in the secondary dialog. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/SplitButton/__stories__/SplitButton.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` SplitButtonExampleDialog({ options: [ { icon: Group, text: "New group" }, { icon: Upload, text: "New board" } ] }) } /> ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Vibe Components in React DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to import components from the @vibe/core library root entry. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Button } from "@vibe/core"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Counter Component Examples in React DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates various usage examples of the Counter component, including different sizes, colors, and limit handling. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/Counter/__stories__/Counter.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Modal Components from Vibe Core DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to import various Modal-related components from the @vibe/core/next package. It includes the main Modal component and its subcomponents for different layouts and parts of the modal. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/Modal/Modal/__stories__/Modal.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` import { Modal, ModalHeader, ModalContent, ModalMedia, ModalFooter, ModalFooterWizard, ModalBasicLayout, ModalSideBySideLayout, ModalMediaLayout } from "@vibe/core/next"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating Counter Size Props DESCRIPTION: Shows the change in Counter component size prop values from abbreviated to full words SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/storybook/stand-alone-documentaion/migration-guide.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` - + ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering BreadcrumbsBar with Icons in JSX DESCRIPTION: Shows how to render a BreadcrumbsBar component with icons for each breadcrumb item. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/BreadcrumbsBar/__stories__/BreadcrumbsBar.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Reusable React Component with ForwardRef in TypeScript DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines a React functional component using forwardRef to allow ref forwarding. It includes proper TypeScript typing with Props interface, className merging with cx, ref merging with a custom hook, and test ID handling. The component renders a div with the component's styles and displays a custom prop value. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/plop/component/component-ts.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: TypeScript CODE: ``` import React, { forwardRef, useRef, ForwardedRef } from "react"; import cx from "classnames"; import useMergeRef from "../../hooks/useMergeRef"; import { getTestId } from "../../tests/test-ids-utils"; import { ComponentDefaultTestId } from "../../tests/constants"; import styles from "./{{properCase componentName}}.module.scss"; import { {{properCase componentName}}Props } from "./{{properCase componentName}}.types"; const {{properCase componentName}} = forwardRef( ( { className, id, "data-testid": dataTestId, customProp = "defaultValue" }: {{properCase componentName}}Props, ref: ForwardedRef ) => { const componentRef = useRef(null); const mergedRef = useMergeRef(ref, componentRef); return (
My awesome component with customProp = {customProp}
); } ); export default {{properCase componentName}}; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Theme Variables with CSS Custom Properties DESCRIPTION: This CSS snippet demonstrates how to define theme variables using CSS custom properties. It shows the default theme variables set on the body element and an example of a color-blind theme override. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/docs/theming.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` body { --primary-text-color: var(--color-mud_black); --positive-color: var(--color-success); --negative-color: var(--color-error); --primary-border-color: var(--color-explosive); --placeholder-color: var(--color-explosive); --icon-color: var(--color-explosive); --icon-color-hover: var(--color-blackish); --primary-active-color: var(--color-basic_blue); } .compass-color-blind0theme { --primary-text-color: white; --positive-color: green; --negative-color: red; --primary-border-color: black; --placeholder-color: black; --icon-color: black; --icon-color-hover: grey; --primary-active-color: blue; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Flex Component as Toolbar Container in JSX DESCRIPTION: This example demonstrates how to use the Flex component to create a responsive toolbar. It showcases the component's ability to organize and layout child elements flexibly. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/Flex/__stories__/Flex.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Default Combobox in JSX DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to render a basic Combobox component with a placeholder and options. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/Combobox/__stories__/Combobox.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating Vibe Core to Version 3.1.0 DESCRIPTION: Changelog entry for Vibe Core version 3.1.0, including bug fixes for table scrolling and new features for Modal components. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # [3.1.0](https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/compare/@vibe/core@3.0.0...@vibe/core@3.1.0) (2024-12-03) ### Bug Fixes * **table:** Reduce scroll delay in table ([#2611](https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/issues/2611)) ([0a37b1a](https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/commit/0a37b1ae03b9338a88d604bd395ba46533a224f0)) ### Features * **Modal:** footers for new Modal component ([#2553](https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/issues/2553)) ([ba63288](https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/commit/ba6328894d132ff4070ece9d47f3b1a9bcb23162)) * **Modal:** layouts for new Modal component ([#2552](https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/issues/2552)) ([97d81fa](https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/commit/97d81fa86ca8018cfb70f4de7d9cb7a2fa701120)) * **Modal:** new Modal components building blocks ([#2432](https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/issues/2432)) ([43b6b42](https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/commit/43b6b42872bceac8bceac114b10ebbff3864f5fa)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using useMediaQuery with a Single Rule in React DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the usage of useMediaQuery hook with a single media query rule in a React component. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/hooks/useMediaQuery/__stories__/useMediaQuery.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating component import patterns from CommonJS to ESM DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to update import statements from CommonJS style imports to modern ESM imports for better compatibility and future support. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/docs/vibe2-migration-guide.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: diff CODE: ``` - import Button from "monday-ui-react-core/dist/Button"; ``` LANGUAGE: diff CODE: ``` + import { Button } from "monday-ui-react-core"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Custom Class Selector Theme Definition DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to apply token overrides for specific class selectors using ThemeProvider. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/ThemeProvider/__stories__/ThemeProvider.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` {"selector": ".custom-theme-class", "light": {"primary-color": "#0073ea", "primary-hover-color": "#0060b9"}, "dark": {"primary-color": "#0073ea", "primary-hover-color": "#0060b9"}, "black": {"primary-color": "#0073ea", "primary-hover-color": "#0060b9"}} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Component Import Dependencies DESCRIPTION: Shows the import statements required for the Button documentation page including Storybook components and related utilities. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/Button/__stories__/Button.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import Button from "../Button"; import { Meta } from "@storybook/blocks"; import { BUTTON_GROUP, BADGE, SPLIT_BUTTON } from "../../../storybook/components/related-components/component-description-map"; import { TipIconButton } from "./Button.stories.helpers"; import * as ButtonStories from "./Button.stories"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Changelog Entry for Version 2.10.1 in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Documents bug fixes for version 2.10.1, including a fix for Tipseen in dark mode. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` ## 2.10.1 (2023-06-21) #### Bug Fixes * [#1362](https://github.com/mondaycom/monday-ui-react-core/pull/1362) Fix bug on Tipseen in dark mode ([@hadasfa](https://github.com/hadasfa)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Documenting useWizard Hook Return Values in JSX DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to document the return values of the useWizard hook, including various properties and functions provided by the hook. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/hooks/useWizard/__stories__/useWizard.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Type-Safe Props in Button Component (TypeScript) DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the improved prop type-checking in Vibe 3, allowing the use of type-safe strings instead of static enums for props. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/storybook/stand-alone-documentaion/migration-guide.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: tsx CODE: ``` // Before // After ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering TextField Component in JSX DESCRIPTION: This example demonstrates how to render a basic TextField component with a title and placeholder. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/TextField/__stories__/TextField.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing and Rendering Changelog in Storybook DESCRIPTION: Imports the CHANGELOG.md file and renders it using Storybook's Meta and Markdown components. The code removes the main 'Change Log' heading before display. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/storybook/stand-alone-documentaion/changelog.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` import { Meta, Markdown } from "@storybook/blocks"; import changelog from "../../../CHANGELOG.md"; # Changelog {changelog.replace("# Change Log", "")} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering useWizard Overview Example in JSX DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to render the overview example of the useWizard hook using Storybook's Canvas component. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/hooks/useWizard/__stories__/useWizard.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing and Running Vibe Codemod CLI - Basic Usage DESCRIPTION: Basic command to run the Vibe codemod transformation tool using npx. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/codemod/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx @vibe/codemod [options] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering TextField in Various Use Cases with JSX DESCRIPTION: These examples showcase different use cases for the TextField component, including forms, placeholder text, required fields, and date/time inputs. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/TextField/__stories__/TextField.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Button Component DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import the Button component from the Vibe core package. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/Button/__stories__/Button.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Button } from "@vibe/core"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Icon Button Primary Example DESCRIPTION: Example of a primary icon button with an Add icon. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/IconButton/__stories__/IconButton.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Toggle Component with Various States DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates different states of the Toggle component, including default, selected, and disabled states. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/Toggle/__stories__/Toggle.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring CSS Container Styles for Dropdown Popovers DESCRIPTION: CSS styles required for setting up a container that properly displays dropdown popovers. Defines positioning, dimensions, and event handling properties to ensure proper dropdown rendering. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/storybook/patterns/dropdown-in-modals/dropdown-in-modals.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` .container { top: 0; right: 0; position: "fixed"; width: "100%"; height: "100%"; pointerevents: "none"; zindex: 99999; } .container * { pointer-events: auto; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing React Icon Components DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import icon components directly for immediate use in React applications SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/icons/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Close } from "@vibe/icons"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying EmptyState Overview Canvas DESCRIPTION: Renders the overview example of the EmptyState component in a Storybook Canvas. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/EmptyState/__stories__/EmptyState.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Required Fonts via HTML Link DESCRIPTION: HTML link tag for importing required Figtree and Poppins font families from Google Fonts. These fonts are necessary for proper component styling. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing ThemeProvider Component DESCRIPTION: Basic import statement for the ThemeProvider component from the Vibe core package. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/ThemeProvider/__stories__/ThemeProvider.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { ThemeProvider } from "@vibe/core"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing TextField Component in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to import the TextField component from the Vibe core library. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/TextField/__stories__/TextField.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { TextField } from "@vibe/core"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing useActiveDescendantListFocus Hook from Vibe Core DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import the useActiveDescendantListFocus hook from the @vibe/core/hooks package. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/hooks/useActiveDescendantListFocus/__stories__/useActiveDescendantListFocus.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { useActiveDescendantListFocus } from "@vibe/core/hooks"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering RadioButton Components in JSX DESCRIPTION: This example demonstrates how to render RadioButton components within a DialogContentContainer, showing different states and groupings. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/RadioButton/__stories__/RadioButton.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Vibe Storybook Components via NPM DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Vibe Storybook components library using npm package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/storybook-blocks/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $ npm install vibe-storybook-components ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Media Modal Components from Vibe Core DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import the necessary Media Modal components from the @vibe/core/next package. These components include Modal, ModalHeader, ModalContent, ModalMedia, ModalFooter, ModalFooterWizard, and ModalMediaLayout. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/Modal/layouts/ModalMediaLayout/__stories__/ModalMediaLayout.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` import { Modal, ModalHeader, ModalContent, ModalMedia, ModalFooter, ModalFooterWizard, ModalMediaLayout } from "@vibe/core/next"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing CSS tokens in a React.js application DESCRIPTION: Code to import the necessary CSS tokens from @vibe/core in your root application file. This ensures all styling foundations are properly loaded. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import "@vibe/core/tokens"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Basic Modal Components from Vibe Core DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import the necessary modal components from the @vibe/core/next package. This includes Modal, ModalHeader, ModalContent, ModalFooter, ModalFooterWizard, and ModalBasicLayout components. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/Modal/layouts/ModalBasicLayout/__stories__/ModalBasicLayout.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` import { Modal, ModalHeader, ModalContent, ModalFooter, ModalFooterWizard, ModalBasicLayout } from "@vibe/core/next"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Tooltip Component in React DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import the Tooltip component from the Vibe core package. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/Tooltip/__stories__/Tooltip.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Tooltip } from "@vibe/core"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing useHover Hook from Vibe Core DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import the useHover hook from the @vibe/core/hooks package. This hook provides functionality to track element hover states in React components. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/hooks/useHover/__stories__/useHover.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { useHover } from "@vibe/core/hooks"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering EditableText Component Overview in JSX DESCRIPTION: This code renders the Overview story of the EditableText component using Storybook's Canvas. It demonstrates the basic usage of the component. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/EditableText/__stories__/EditableText.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Text-Only BreadcrumbsBar in JSX DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to render a BreadcrumbsBar component with text-only breadcrumb items. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/BreadcrumbsBar/__stories__/BreadcrumbsBar.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing monday-ui-style Package DESCRIPTION: Installation commands for adding monday-ui-style package using npm or yarn package managers. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/style/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install monday-ui-style # or yarn add monday-ui-style ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing ListItem Components from Vibe Core DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import the ListItem component and its related subcomponents (ListItemIcon and ListItemAvatar) from the Vibe core library. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/ListItem/__stories__/ListItem.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` import { ListItem, ListItemIcon, ListItemAvatar } from "@vibe/core"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Exporting React Component and Types in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to export a React component as the default export and all associated types from a separate file. It uses ES6 module syntax with dynamic component naming. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/plop/component/component-index.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` export { default as {{componentName}} } from "./{{componentName}}"; export * from "./{{componentName}}.types"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Attention Box with Title and Text in JSX DESCRIPTION: This example demonstrates how to render an Attention Box component with a title and text content. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/AttentionBox/__stories__/AttentionBox.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Search Component Variants in JSX DESCRIPTION: This code demonstrates how to render different variants of the Search component, including sizes and additional actions. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/Search/__stories__/Search.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing useMediaQuery Hook in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import the useMediaQuery hook from the Vibe core hooks package. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/hooks/useMediaQuery/__stories__/useMediaQuery.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { useMediaQuery } from "@vibe/core/hooks"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Color Coded Chips in React DESCRIPTION: Example of how to create a chip with a specific color category. This demonstrates using the 'color' prop to apply a predefined color theme to the chip. SOURCE: https://github.com/mondaycom/vibe/blob/master/packages/core/src/components/Chips/__stories__/Chips.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Accordion Components DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import the Accordion and AccordionItem components from the Vibe core library.
